org.youscope.common

Interface Component

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AutoFocusJob, CellDetectionAddon, CellDetectionJob, CellVisualizationAddon, ChangePositionJob, ComposedImagingJob, CompositeJob, ContinuousImagingJob, ControllerJob, CustomJob, DeviceSettingJob, DropletControllerResource, DropletMicrofluidicJob, DropletObserverResource, FluigentJob, FocusingJob, FocusScoreResource, FocusSearchResource, ImagingJob, Job, LiveModifiableJob, Measurement, NemesysJob, OnixJob, OutOfFocusJob, PlateScanningJob, RepeatJob, Resource, SaveSettings, ScriptingJob, ShortContinuousImagingJob, SlimJob, StaggeringJob, StatisticsJob, WaitForUserJob, WaitJob
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EditableJobContainerAdapter, JobAdapter, ResourceAdapter, StandardSaveSettings

    public interface Component
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Represents the base interface of all components of a measurement, that is, the mesurement itself, its tasks, the jobs and any eventually used resources.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

      • addMessageListener

        void addMessageListener(MessageListener writer)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Adds a message listener to which (non-error) status information is send.
        Parameters:
        writer - Listener to which output should be written.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • removeMessageListener

        void removeMessageListener(MessageListener writer)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Removes a previously added listener.
        Parameters:
        writer - Listener which should be removed.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getPositionInformation

        PositionInformation getPositionInformation()
                                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns the component's position information, e.g. in which well, tile, or z-stack location it is.
        Returns:
        Position information vector.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns a name of the component meant for human interpretation.
        Returns:
        Name/short description of component.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • setName

        void setName(java.lang.String name)
      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sets the name of the component meant for human interpretation. Usually, the default name of a component contains already sufficient information. However, for some measurement types it can be of advantage to rename certain components which have a specific meaning for the respective measurement.
        Parameters:
        name - Name/short description of the component.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getUUID

        java.util.UUID getUUID()
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns a unique ID of the component. No two components have the same unique ID, even if they are created using the same configuration. See UUID.equals(Object) and UUID.randomUUID().
        Returns:
        Unique ID of the component.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
